questionTitle: Salesforce.com is the largest ______ provider of CRM software.
questionExplanation: Salesforce.com extended its SaaS offering to allow developers to create add-on applications.

questionOption1: Mashups are an incredibly useful hybrid Web application
questionOption2: SaaS will eventually replace all locally installed software
questionOption3: The establishment and proof of identity is a central network function
questionExplanation: An identity service is one that stores the information associated with a digital entity in a form that can be queried and managed for use in electronic transactions.

questionTitle: Which of the following group is dedicated to support technologies that implement enterprise mashups?
questionExplanation: This group predicts that the use of mashups will grow by a factor of 10 within just a few years.

questionTitle: Which of the following attribute should be unique?
questionExplanation: A digital identity is those attributes and metadata of an object along with a set of relationships with other objects that makes an object identifiable.

questionOption1: Distributed transaction systems such as internetworks or cloud computing systems magnify the difficulties faced by identity management systems
questionOption2: Services that provide digital identity management as a service have been part of internetworked systems from Day One
questionOption3: IDaaS Server establishes the identity of a domain as belonging to a set of assigned addresses
questionExplanation: The name servers that run the various Internet domains are IDaaS servers.

questionTitle: __________ authentication requires the outside use of a network security or trust service.
questionExplanation: More secure authentication requires the use of at least two-factor authentication.

questionTitle: ________ is the assignment of a network identity to a specific MAC address that allows systems to be found on networks.
questionExplanation: Network interfaces are identified uniquely by Media Access Control (MAC) addresses, which alternatively are referred to as Ethernet Hardware Addresses.

questionTitle: _________ is one of the more expensive and complex areas of network computing.
questionExplanation: Ticket or token providing services, certificate servers, and other trust mechanisms all provide identity services that can be pushed out of private networks and into the cloud.

questionTitle: Which of the following is provided by Identity as a Service?
questionExplanation: Identity as a Service or the related hosted (managed) identity services may be the most valuable and cost effective distributed service types you can subscribe to.

questionTitle: Which of the following figure fully represent standards needed by IDaaS applications for interoperability?
questionExplanation: Cloud computing IDaaS applications must rely on a set of developing industry standards to provide interoperability.
